short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides posts containing specified words in facebook posts to protect you from spoilers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of treading social media as if it was a minefield when a new episode of your favorite series is out? SpoilerGuard will hide Facebook posts that contain keywords you provide so that no one spoils you a Red Wedding ever again.
